relation: We may share your information as follows:
Among our brands. Our brands include Del Webb, Pulte, Centex and DiVosta.
If we think we have to in order to comply with the law. For example, if we are required to file reports with government agencies or in response to a court order or subpoena.
With our vendors or partners. For example, we may share your information with third parties we hire to provide services like operating our website.

In the event that all or part of our company transfers ownership. For example, we may share information with actual or potential buyers of our company. We will share your information with a new owner. We may also sell all or part of our customer lists as part of an asset sale.
For other reasons we might describe to you.

On our interactive forums. We may also allow you to submit comments on our sites. Please remember that any information disclosed in these areas becomes public information. You should not disclose your personal information in such a forum if you do not want it shared publicly.
pageTitle: Cumberland Hall New Home Plan | Georgetown, TX | | Del Webb Home Builders | Sun City Texas
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {73934=The Home Energy Rating System (HERS) index was developed by the Residential Energy Service Network (RESNET) and is recognized by the Environmental Protection Agency and U.S. Department of Energy. The index is based on a score of 100 for a typical code-built new home (based on the 2006 International Energy Conservation Code)., 67156=You can contact us by email at emailresponse@pulte.com. You can call us at 866-239-1739. You can write to us at 100 Bloomfield Hills Parkway, Suite 300, Bloomfield Hills, MI 48304, ATTN: Marketing and Communications.}
textBeforeTable: Information Sharing To send you transactional communications. For example, we use your information to notify you about your account. We may also send you other information about our relationship with you. To promote PulteGroup and our related companies. For example, we use your information to send you marketing materials. We may also use your information to notify you of new products or features. For security purposes. We may need to use information to protect our website and our users. We may also use information to protect our company or our affiliates. To improve our products and services and for related business purposes. For example, we use your information to help us understand you. This includes analyzing how this site is used. We also use your information to make website improvements. We also may use information to customize your browsing experience. We may do these activities using the tracking technologies described here. To respond to your requests. For example, we may use your information to process your employment application. We use your information in the following ways: How We Use Information We collect information from you passively. We use common tracking tools such as browser cookies and web beacons to collect information passively. Click here to learn more about our use of tracking tools. We collect information directly from you. For example, we collect information when you register on one of our websites. We also collect information when you apply for a job online. How
textAfterTable: Your Choices To stop receiving our promotional emails, send us an opt-out request to emailresponse@pulte.com. To manage cookies and other tracking tools, please click here. You can choose whether to give us your personal information. You can also choose to disable tracking tools like cookies. If you do not give us certain information we ask, or turn off tracking tools, our websites may not work as well. Our Sites and Children We do not knowingly collect information from children under 13. We do not target or direct our website to children. Parents or guardians, if you think we have information about your child who is under 13, please contact us. To learn more about how to protect your child online, visit the FTC’s website and read the helpful information provided by the FTC. Security We maintain reasonable security measures to protect our websites and your information. No site is 100% secure, however. You should thus be careful when using the Internet, especially if you are submitting personal information online. Links This Website may contain links to third party sites. We do not control these sites and we are not responsible for their content or privacy practices. You should use caution and judgment when sharing information on third party sites. Any information you reveal on third party sites is not subject to this Policy. You should consult the privacy policies of each website you visit. Contacting Us You can contact us by email at
